_xResult.title: Mia Linen Tank Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen blouse with deep V back
_xResult.longdesc:
Shantima's Mia tank top is made of their customary medium weight linen, pre-washed and softened so that it will no longer shrink when washed. It can be worn in a layered fashion, underneath blazers or a flowing kimono, or as a standalone blouse. It's cut with clean lines so that it's sure to make you look elegant however it's worn.

 

This tank top comes in 31 different colors so choose from the palette in the last image and be sure to indicate your color preference during checkout!

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human-ecological requirements.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
